{{Wired embedded system |brand=Atmel |model=SAMA5D4 |revision=Xplained Ultra |asin=B0118732AS |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |price=99 |est_release_date=01/2015 |pcb_id=A08-2203/1 |type=development board |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Atmel |cpu1_model=ATSAM5D44 |cpu1_cspeed=528 |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=29F4G08ABAE |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT47H128M16RT-25E:C |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=3 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, populated,, , J13 |serial=yes,, 6-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J1 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Micrel |eth_chip2_model=KSZ8081 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Advanced PMU,Active-Semi;ACT8865;;1;,,, HDMI Transmitter;Lattice Semiconductor;Sil9022A;;1;,,, 32-bit AVR microcontroller;Atmel;AT32UC3A4256;;1;,,, I2C 2Kbit Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24MAC4602;;1;,,, Dual USB High-Side Power Switch;Sipex;SP2526A;;1;,,, Non-Inverting 3-State Buffer;On Semi;NL17SZ126;;2;,,, Low Capacitance Double Rail-to-rail ESD Protection Diode;NXP;PRTR5V0U2X;;1;,,, 150mA Ultra Low Supply Current LDO Regulator;On Semi;NCP4682;;1;,,, Overvoltage Protection Controller;ON Semi;NCP349;;1; |flags=SD Card slot, HDMI 1.4a, RGB LCD FPC, Arduino expansion, SPI, RTC w/ battery |stock_boot=U-Boot;2014.07; |stock_os=LInux;3.10.0;Poky; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=root |default_pass=blank |oui_eth=FC:C2:3D }} {{TagLine|SAMA5D4 Xplained Ultra}} :[https://www.microchip.com/en-us/development-tool/ATSAMA5D4-XULT Product page]
*[https://www.cnx-software.com/2015/01/19/atmel-sama5d4-xplained-ultra-development-board-adds-hdmi-720p-video-decoding/ ''Atmel SAMA5D4 Xplained Ultra Development Board'' on '''CNX|Software''' ] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/low-cost-cortex-a5-dev-board-accepts-arduino-shields/ ''Sub-$100 Cortex-A5 dev board accepts Arduino shields'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.linux4sam.org/bin/view/Linux4SAM/Sama5d4XplainedMainPage ''SAMA5D4 Xplained Board'' on '''Linux & Open Source for AT91 Microchip Microprocessors''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Atmel]]'' ATSAMA5D44 :@528MHz (ARM Cortex A5) *Memory: 512MB (SDRAM) DDR2 *Storage: 512MB NAND, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *Video Output: HDMI 1.4a or TFT LCD *Network: 1x Fast Ethernet port *USB: 2x USB 2.0 Host, 1x Micro USB Device *Power Source: 5V 2A via microUSB
==Images== <gallery> File:SAMA5D4 Xplained Ultra Top.jpeg|Board Top File:SAMA5D4 Xplained Ultra Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
